DOC.brief_summary: Endometrial sample improves pregnancy rate superovulation-IUI cycle
DOC.brief_title: Improving Pregnancy Rate With Endometrial Sampling Before Intrauterine Insemination
DOC.detailed_description: Endometrial sampling perform use standard technique outpatient department . Similarly , superovulation gonadotrophin perform accord standard practice.Endometrial sample do follicular phase later day 10 cycle . Endometrial sampling perform use Pipelle sample catheter . The Pipelle insert gently cervical canal uterine cavity advance slowly till resistance felt operator . Then , piston withdrawn create negative suction gentle movement Pipelle uterine cavity perform uterine wall . The Pipelle catheter withdrawn gently obtain specimen send histopathological examination .
DOC.criteria: 1 . All woman undergo superovulation gonadotrophin intrauterine insemination . 2 . All woman cervical factor , mild male factor and/or unexplained infertility . 3 . At least one patent Fallopian tube . 1 . Bilateral tubal disease 2 . Severe male factor infertility 3 . Intrauterine pathology ( submucosal fibroid , endometrial polyp , adhesion ) 4 . Women positive cervical culture and/or acute vaginal infection
